Overwatch_Characters.name: Ana
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: sleep dart : fires a dart that puts an enemy to sleep.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Biotic Grenade :Throws a grenade that heals and increases healing on allies, while damaging and preventing healing on enemies
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Nano Boost : Increases an ally's damage, while reducing damage taken.

Overwatch_Characters.name: Ashe
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: Coach Gun : Blast enemies in front of you and knock yourself backwards.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Dynamite :Throw an explosive that detonates after a short delay or immediately when shot.
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: B.O.B. : Deploy Bob. He charges forward and knocks enemies into the air, then attacks with his arm cannons.

Overwatch_Characters.name: Baptiste
Overwatch_Characters.Passive: Exo Boots : Hold crouch to jump higher.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: Regenerative Burst : Activate to heal yourself and nearby allies instantly, with additional healing over time. Instant heal is doubled for targets less than half health..
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Immortality Field : Toss a device that prevents allies from dying. The device can be destroyed.
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Amplification Matrix : Project a matrix that doubles the damage and healing effects of allied projectiles.

Overwatch_Characters.name: Bastion
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: A-36 Tactical Grenade : Fire a bomb that bounces off walls and explodes when it impacts enemies or the ground.
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Configuration Artillery : Become immobile and fire up to 3 powerful artillery shells.

Overwatch_Characters.name: Brigitte
Overwatch_Characters.Passive: Inspire : Dealing damage to enemies heals nearby allies.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: Repair Pack : Heals an ally for a short duration.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Whip Shot : Launch your flail forward to knock an enemy away from you.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_3: Barrier Shield : Hold secondary fire to deploy a frontal energy barrier.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_4: Shield Bash : Available when Barrier Shield is deployed. Dash forward to knock back an enemy.
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Configuration Artillery : Become immobile and fire up to 3 powerful artillery shells.

Overwatch_Characters.name: Cassidy
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: Combat Roll : Roll in the direction you're moving and reload.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Magnetic Grenade : Throw a short-range grenade that homes in on nearby enemies and deals additional damage if it sticks to them.
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Deadeye : Face off against your enemies. Press Q to lock on, then Q or primary fire to fire.

Overwatch_Characters.name: Doomfist
Overwatch_Characters.Passive: The Best Defense : Dealing damage with abilities creates temporary personal health.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: Seismic Slam : Leap and smash the ground.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Power Block : Protect yourself from frontal attacks. Blocking heavy damage empowers Rocket Punch.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_3: Rocket Punch : Hold to charge then release to launch forward and knock an enemy back. Damage increases if the enemy hits a wall.
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Meteor Strike : Leap up into the air. Move the targeting circle, then press the primary fire to strike the targeted area.

Overwatch_Characters.name: D.va
Overwatch_Characters.Passive: Eject! : Eject out of your mech when it is destroyed.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: Boosters : Fly in the direction you are facing.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Defense Matrix : Block projectiles in an area in front of you.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_3: Micro Missiles : Launch a volley of explosive rockets.
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Self-Destruct : Eject and overload your mech, causing it to explode after a short time.

Overwatch_Characters.name: Echo
Overwatch_Characters.Passive: Glide : Hold jump to glide while falling.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: Sticky Bombs : Fire a volley of sticky bombs that detonate after a delay.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Flight : Fly forward quickly and then free-fly briefly.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_3: Focusing Beam : Channel a beam for a few seconds. Deals very high damage to targets under half health.
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Self-Destruct : Eject and overload your mech, causing it to explode after a short time.

Overwatch_Characters.name: Genji
Overwatch_Characters.Passive: Cyber-agility : Climb on walls and double jump.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: Deflect : Deflect incoming projectiles towards the direction you are aiming and block melee attacks.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Swift Strike : Rapidly dash forward and inflict damage on enemies. Eliminations reset the cooldown.
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Dragonblade : Unsheathe a deadly melee weapon.

Overwatch_Characters.name: Hanzo
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: Sonic Arrow : Hanzo launches an arrow that contains a sonar tracking device. Any enemy within its detection radius is visibly marked, making them easier for Hanzo and his allies to hunt down.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Storm Arrows : Hanzoâ€™s next several arrows fire instantly, but at reduced damage.
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_3: Lunge : Hanzo can double jump, allowing him to change direction mid-jump.
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Dragonstrike : Hanzo summons a Spirit Dragon which travels through the air in a line. It passes through walls in its way, devouring any enemies it encounters.

Overwatch_Characters.name: JUNKER QUEEN
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_1: Jagged Blade : Active: Throws a blade in an arc. Re-activate ability to recall. If it sticks to an enemy, the enemy will be pulled back when the blade returns. Damages enemies in both directions. Passive: Quick Melee wounds enemies, dealing damage over time
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_2: Commanding Shout : Increase health by 200 and nearby allies health by 50 Increase movement speed by 30%
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_3: Carnage : Swing your axe to wound all enemies in front of you dealing damage over time
Overwatch_Characters.ABilities_4: Adrenaline Rush : All wound damage that Junker Queen does causes her to heal herself
Overwatch_Characters.Ultimate: Rampage : Charge foward. Wound enemies, dealing damage over time and preventing them from being healed
